page.title: 03HOPKINS FAMILY OF WREXHAM
page.content: My Dad John Hopkins who works in Marstons Brewery gets up at 6.OO in the morning with my Mum Pat Hopkins. She has to get him ready for work. My Mum makes him his breakfast and does the housework. At 7.OO a.m. my Mum gets me up ( Nicky Hopkins ) to get ready for school. I get dressed and washed and go down for my breakfast. By now my Dad has gone to work, so after I have had my breakfast I listen to Marcher Sound ( the local radio station ) until 8.OO a.m. then I go to school. My Mum goes to town with my Nanna. I get home at about 3.55 p.m. and about ten minutes later my Dad comes home, so then we have tea. After that we just watch the television from 9.00 til about 9.30 p.m.,then I go to bed. About ten o'clock til 10.30 p.m.,my Mum and Dad go to bed.
